<!-- menu action -->
<record :id="server.id" model="ir.actions.server">
    <field name="name">{{server.name}}</field>
    <field name="domain">{{server.domain}}</field>
    <field name="model_id" :ref="server.model_id"/>
    <field name="binding_model_id" :ref="server.model_id"/>
    <field name="state">code</field>
    <field name="code">action=records.{{server.methods}}()</field>
</record>
